chapter.title: Dashboard
chapter.para: The OpenStack dashboard is a web-based interface that allows you to manage OpenStack resources and services. The dashboard allows you to interact with the OpenStack Compute cloud controller using the OpenStack APIs. For more information about installing and configuring the dashboard, see the OpenStack Installation Guide for your operating system.
